name: D0WNF4LL
description:
BRACKEYS 2021.2 SUBMISSION

Fight for the survival of the human race in this fast-paced brawler hack-and-slash for the Windows PC. 

BOLD, FLUID ACTION

Dodge and weave through hordes of enemies as you hack and slash them apart with your dual swords and excellent skills. Experience the thrill of the fight with 13 different combo moves to discover, endless approaches, and high octane animation canceling lock-on dodge combat.

Dodge bullets, outrun gunners, tear through crowds of bloodthirsty opponents, take down giant mechas and fight off seemingly mystical aliens.

AAA QUALITY GRAPHICS

Experience the story of D0WNF4LL with visually breathtaking graphical fidelity. Every hit feels as satisfying as the last with particles that pop and every environment feels like a new and interesting place.

KICKASS MUSIC

Experience your own badassery through an intense industrial, grunge soundscape delivered by Nine Inch Nails.  

SAVE. THE. WORLD! Controls Keyboard/MouseControllerActionWASDLeft ThumbstickMoveMouseRight ThumbstickLookLeft ClickLeft Face ButtonAttack ARight ClickTop Face ButtonAttack BTabSelectToggle targetingShiftRight TriggerSprintLeft CtrlLeft BumperSlideSpaceA(in movement mode) JumpSpace/EA/B(in combat mode) Dodge
